summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING AT 10 MPH, THE BRAKES FAILED AND CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO BECOME DIFFICULT TO STOP. THE CONTACT STATED THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURE WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 44,000.
